titles.title: Come Christians, Join To Sing (Christian Henry Bateman)

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise yet our Christ again, Alleluia! Amen! Life shall not end the strain; Alleluia! Amen! On heaven’s blissful shore His goodness we’ll adore, Singing forevermore, “Alleluia! Amen!”{/lang-eng}
